question: The Suhrawardi order was popularized in Kashmir by which of the following saint?
explanation: Makhdum Hamzah Kashmiri popularised the Suhrawardi order in Kashmir. He was not in the favour of Shia influence in Kashmir and made constant efforts to weaken it. Baba Dawud Khaki Suhrawardi was the most eminent disciple of Makhdum Hamzah Kashmiri.
